title: SSr Backend Developer
shortDescription: Member of the backend team of a fintech and crypto project

itemsDescriptions.name: Build and develop a new fiat and crypto wallet project as a Backend Developer, utilizing JavaScript and Typescript, and taking on modular responsibility for backend development
Work in a small start-up environment, and an eagerness to take on challenges such as reducing infrastructure costs and learning about crypto technologies
Collaborate with a team of developers to deliver high-quality backend systems, ensuring seamless functionality of the fiat and crypto wallet project.
Replacing the old legacy monolith chat application services with a micro-services structure
Mantining communication channels applications, such as phone call and Whatsapp integrations
Manage and implement changes to improve resiliency
Keep updated infrastructure in AWS stacks
Supporting a designated group of students undertaking teacher designated activities
Promote their own continuous professional development, and engage enthusiastically with the processes of become a developer.
working in main players of industries like Siemens and Airbus
Leading multidisciplinary team on differents sites
